00037 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00038 {
00039 
00041 enum DataSetColumnTypes {
00042         ByteColType,
00043         UByteColType,
00044         ShortColType,
00045         UShortColType,
00046         IntColType,
00047         UIntColType,
00048         FloatColType,
00049         ASCIICharColType,
00050         UnicodeCharColType
00051 };
00052 
00054 class ColumnInfo
00055 {
00056 private:
00058         std::wstring name;
00060         DataSetColumnTypes type;
00062         int32_t size;
00064         int32_t len;
00066         int32_t overhead;
00067 
00068 protected:
00076         ColumnInfo(const std::wstring& name_, DataSetColumnTypes type_, int32_t size_, int32_t len_, int32_t overhead_)
00077                 : name(name_), type(type_), size(size_), len(len_), overhead(overhead_)
00078         {
00079         }
00080 
00081 public:
00082 
00088         ColumnInfo(const std::wstring& name_, DataSetColumnTypes type_, int32_t totalSize)
00089                 : name(name_), type(type_), size(totalSize), len(1), overhead(0)
00090         {
00091                 if (type == ASCIICharColType || type == UnicodeCharColType)
00092                 {
00093                         overhead = 4;
00094                         if (type == UnicodeCharColType)
00095                         {
00096                                 size = sizeof(int16_t);
00097                                 len = (totalSize-overhead)/sizeof(int16_t);
00098                         }
00099                         else if (type == ASCIICharColType)
00100                         {
00101                                 size = sizeof(int8_t);
00102                                 len = (totalSize-overhead)/sizeof(int8_t);
00103                         }
00104                 }
00105         }
00106 
00110         bool operator==(const ColumnInfo &p) const { return (name == p.name && type == p.type && size == p.size); }
00111 
00115         bool operator!=(const ColumnInfo &p) const { return (name != p.name || type != p.type || size != p.size); }
00116 
00120         DataSetColumnTypes GetColumnType() const { return type; }
00121 
00125         int32_t GetSize() const { return size*len + overhead; }
00126 
00130         int32_t GetLength() const { return len; }
00131 
00135         std::wstring GetName() { return name; }
00136 };
00137 
00139 class ByteColumn : public ColumnInfo
00140 {
00141 public:
00142 
00143         ByteColumn(const std::wstring& name_) : ColumnInfo(name_, ByteColType, sizeof(int8_t), 1, 0) {}
00144 };
00145

00151         UByteColumn(const std::wstring& name_) : ColumnInfo(name_, UByteColType, sizeof(u_int8_t), 1, 0) {}
00152 };

00195 class ASCIIColumn : public ColumnInfo
00196 {
00197 public:
00198 
00199         ASCIIColumn(const std::wstring& name_, int32_t maxLn) : ColumnInfo(name_, ASCIICharColType, sizeof(int8_t), maxLn, 4) {}
00200 };
00201 
00202 /* Unicode string column */
00203 class UnicodeColumn : public ColumnInfo
00204 {
00205 public:
00206 
00207         UnicodeColumn(const std::wstring& name_, int32_t maxLn) : ColumnInfo(name_, UnicodeCharColType, sizeof(int16_t), maxLn, 4) {}
00208 };
